neutral.LastUpdate: VERSION 0.3.7 RELEASED OCTOBER 15, 2023\n- Checklist autocomplete fixed
neutral.OlderHistory:
VERSION 0.2.9 RELEASED JANUARY 17, 2023\n- Engine performance increased to match more closely the real-world behavior.
- Now it is easier to overstress the rotor RPM and torque under heavy load.
- The helicopter is easier to stabilize now in cruise flight with trim and assistances turned off.
- Low rotor warning sound now sounds when the battery is switched on.
- Annunciators illumination is stronger now in DIM mode.
- Altimeter barometric scale values now match up with the simulator values.
- Gauge illumination is toned down preventing it to being overblown on maximum brightness settings.
- Auto-trim switch has been removed.
- Force trim switch has been removed.
- Pedal stop functionality added (limits left pedal movement during flight) above 50 kts.
- Rotor rotation animation in multiplayer is now functioning.
- Rotor brake is functional again.
- Used fuel type in the weight and balance settings is JET fuel.
- Added Turkish language translation.
- Added Korean language translation.
- Pedal animation adjustments on the connecting rod is fixed.
- Interior collider adjustments. The camera doesnâ€™t clip into the main panel anymore.
- VR support adjustments. Full VR support.
- Reference cruise speed now shows the correct value on the aircraft selection screen.\n\nVERSION 0.3.3 RELEASED SEPTEMBER 27, 2023\n- Localization corrections
- Performance data corrections
- Changes in the throttle/governor functionality during startup and shutdown.
- Manual throttle/RPM control still doesn't work properly during normal procedures due to missing core functionality.
- Weight and balance correcrions, fuel setting corrections.\n\nVERSION 0.3.4 RELEASED OCTOBER 3, 2023\n- Dynamics of the rotor blades tweaked\n\nVERSION 0.3.5 RELEASED D 1, 0\n- Further rotor resistance tweaks\n\nVERSION 0.3.6 RELEASED OCTOBER 7, 2023\n- FADEC tooltip
- Fuel Pressure gauge not illuminaion
- Further rotor weight changes
- Further engine performance changes
- Cold and dark state changes
- Checklist correction
